sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"最远的"之意。
means: extreme ： 普通用词，指最远的意思时，与farthest和outermost含义相当。
utmost ： 较正式用词，指最远部分或最远地区。
outermost ： 指离中心最远的或指一个平面或物体最外边的部分。
farthest是far的最高级形式，指最大的距离。
furthest与farthest相比，除指数量或程度上的最多或最大。

sentence.Network_en: My limited diplomatic skills were tested to the utmost.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有限的外交手腕儿受到了极其严峻的考验。

sentence.Network_en: They mean to bleed the British to the utmost.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们要最大限度地榨取英国人的财富。

sentence.Network_en: One thing is certain, both have the utmost respect for each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一点可以肯定，那就是双方都非常尊重对方。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 外贸英语经典对话 - shmily的日志 - 网易博客 ... stainless steel 不锈钢 utmost 极限，竭尽所能 cost level 成本费用的水平.
4级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... usually ad. 通常，经常，平常 utmost a. 极度的，最大的n.极限，极度，最大可能 utter vt. 发出(声音)，说a.完全.
新视野大学英语3单词表 - 豆丁网 ... seminar n. 研讨会 ▲ utmost n. 极限，最大限度 worthwhile a. 值得（做）的.
英语词根_百度知道 ... implement 工具 utmost 极端的不是最高级 illness 疾病.

list.abs: Life-and-death | Chinese Dictionary ... 拚死 to risk one's life 拼死拼活 one's utmost; 生命在于运动 life is motion.
this is an issue of the utmost importance ., 这是一个极为重要的问题.
utilization 使用utmost dispatch 最快速度utmost dispatch 最快速度最快速遣
utmost是什么意思_utmost的翻译_音标_读音... ... utmost1.  极限，竭尽所能 at utmost1. 最大程度 utmost a.n1.  极度的；极限.

jx.jx_en_mean: do the most that one is able

lj.lj_ly: Dan was doing his utmost to be helpful.

entry.def: You can use utmost to emphasize the importance or seriousness of something or to emphasize the way that it is done.

example.ex: It is a matter of the utmost urgency to find out what has happened to these people...
example.tran: 当务之急是要弄清楚这些人出了什么事。

example.ex: Security matters are treated with the utmost seriousness...
example.tran: 安全问题的处理极其严肃。

entry.def: If you say that you are doing your utmost to do something, you are emphasizing that you are trying as hard as you can to do it.

example.ex: He would have done his utmost to help her, of that she was certain...
example.tran: 他肯定会尽最大努力帮她，这一点她非常肯定。

example.ex: He will try his utmost to help them by means of his conventional medical knowledge.
example.tran: 他将会用自己的传统医学知识尽全力帮助他们。

entry.def: If you say that something is done to the utmost, you are emphasizing that it is done to the greatest extent, amount, or degree possible.

example.ex: My limited diplomatic skills were tested to the utmost...
example.tran: 我有限的外交手腕儿受到了极其严峻的考验。

example.ex: The best plan is to continue to attack him to the utmost of our power.
example.tran: 最佳方案就是继续不遗余力地攻击他。

means.word_mean: 1. of the greatest possible degree or extent or intensity;

sentences.sentence: "to the last measure of human endurance"
"whether they were accomplices in the last degree or a lesser one was...to be determined individually"

means.word_mean: 3. (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order;

sentences.sentence: "don't go beyond the farthermost (or furthermost) tree"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ut出去.过时,外面+er反复做→反复放出去→发表[全然的, 绝对的]→发出, 做声
ut出去.过时,外面+most最→最外面→最远的→极限

Sentence.sentence: Pielke said that "climate change is an important problem requiring our utmost attention.
Thus, wearing the right brand of clothes or shoes may be of the utmost importance.

means.word_mean: 极度的, 最大的, 最远的

sentences.cn: 没有问题是最大的问题。

sentences.en: He walked to the utmost edge of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 他走到悬崖的最边缘的地方。

sentences.en: The ability for him to get the job is utmost.
sentences.cn: 他得到这份工作的可能性极大。

sentences.en: That is the utmost that I can do.
Each man is free to exercise his special talents to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 每个人都可以尽力发挥他的专长。

jushi.english: He walked to the utmost edge of the cliff.
jushi.chinese: 他走到悬崖的最边缘的地方。

jushi.english: Learning is of the utmost importance.

jushi.chinese: 没有问题是最大的问题。
